original: atha khalu bhagavantaḥ sarvatathāgatāḥ bhagavantaṃ mahāvajrasattvaṃ stuvanti sma
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavantaḥ sarva tathāgatāḥ bhagavantam mahā vajra sattvam stuvanti sma
translated: Then indeed the Blessed Ones, all the Tathagatas, praised the Blessed One, Great Vajrasattva:

analyzed: moha vajra svabhāvaḥ tvam yamāriḥ ati bhīṣaṇaḥ
translated: You are of the nature of delusion vajra, terrifying delight of the Yamaris.

analyzed: sarva buddha mayaḥ śāntaḥ kāya vajra namaḥ astu te  /
translated: Peaceful, consisting of all Buddhas, body vajra, homage to you!

analyzed: piśuna vajra svabhāvaḥ tvam yamāriḥ ati bhīṣaṇaḥ
translated: You are of the nature of slander vajra, terrifying delight of the Yamaris.

analyzed: citta vajra pratīkāśaḥ ratna vajra namaḥ astu te
translated: Resembling mind vajra, jewel vajra, homage to you!

analyzed: rāga vajra svabhāvaḥ tvam yamāriḥ ati bhīṣaṇaḥ
translated: You are of the nature of passion vajra, terrifying delight of the Yamaris.

analyzed: sarva ghoṣa vara agra agrya vāc vajra namaḥ astu te  īrṣyā vajra svabhāvaḥ tvam yamāri rati bhīṣaṇaḥ
translated: Foremost of all excellent voices, speech vajra, homage to you!🔽You are of the nature of envy vajra, terrifying delight of the Yamaris.

analyzed: kāya vajra pratīkāśa saṅga pāṇe namaḥ astu te  /
translated: Resembling body vajra, grasping hand, homage to you!

analyzed: sarva buddha svabhāvaḥ tvam sarva buddha eka saṃgrahaḥ
translated: You are of the nature of all Buddhas, sole compendium of all Buddhas,

analyzed: sarva buddha vara agra agrya maṇḍala īśa namaḥ astu te
translated: Foremost of all excellent Buddhas, lord of the mandala, homage to you!
The praise of the glorious Great Vajrasattva is completed.
